website_summaries.verdict: These soft, stylish slip-on sneakers boast a timeless look and feel.
pros: Classic style ensures the sneakers will complement any outfit
Rubber soles help keep a child's feet safe and comfortable at all times
Easy to spot clean the sneakers with a damp cloth as needed
Include anti-collision toe caps for additional foot protection
cons: Seams on the sneakers tend to fall apart easily
Sneakers are wider than many comparable options

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get on
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the color mainly and wanted a slip on shoe for my 3yo. Unfortunately the color isnt as pink as the image but is still nice. My main issue with the shoe is that they are hard for me to put on her and impossible for her to do on her own. They are tight to stay on the feet but they dont have a pull tab or other way to force them on. I bought an almost identical pair in a different brand but they were easier to get on
customer_reviews.author: CarolynTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Either these run big or they sent me the wrong size. It says 21 on the bottom. I ordered a 5 toddler so not sure how that correlates. Also, the opening is pretty tight, very hard to get feet in even when the shoe itself is so big. They are really cute tho, color as expected & seem to be decent quality. Guess we will save them for when she grows into them...
customer_reviews.author: ELieb

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old son goes through sneakers so quickly due to his growth spurts and just “being a kid” ... the sneakers are so adorable and worth every penny! They are easy for him to get on/off but not too easy that they fall off! He loves them and never complains of discomfort. They fit a tiny bit larger than his normal target brand shoes I typically buy but I would still suggest ordering the normal size you typically purchase as I feel if I ordered a size down they may be too snug! The gray color is nice and I’m going to be ordering the navy color soon! Highly recommended ⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Julie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to get on a toddler
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are so cute and fit as expected, but my problem is they are SOOOOOO hard to get on. There is nothing on the back of the shoe to help you pull the heel on (which I sadly didn't notice before purchase) so they are very difficult to put on my almost 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Marie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I just cannot give five stars because they don't have a pull-on tab at the back. They're a little hard to get on a toddler's foot. But they are pretty and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy the Teacher

customer_reviews.title: For when you have a diva daughter but don't want to spend diva money on her shoes
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves shoes, and likes to wear a different pair every day. Obviously I am not spending that money on her to have 40 pairs of $40 shoes. So these are great for the price and for her to run around in and play at the park/daycare/etc. and I don't care if they get ruined since they are so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: AFO COMPATIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: AFO PARENTS! I bought these in hope that they would fit my 3 year old daughters feet plus her AFO's and I was NOT disappointed. They go on so easily and they're comfortable for her! As always buy a pair 1-2 sizes bigger in order to fit the AFO's. They're our go to shoes! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie & Sam Angelle

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and my picky toddler loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old wears a size 10 in his other shoes. I couldn't tell what way to go with others reviews, so I just went ahead and got the "10 Little Kids" or, as it says in my cart, "28." They fit perfectly on his wide feet. He loves them, which is saying a lot because he is EXTREMELY picky about shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Versatile toddler shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding shoes that fit my son because he has very wide ankles. These fit great and are super cute. I’m guessing they’re comfortable too because my son had a full on tantrum because I took them off the first day we had them and he wanted to wear them to bed. Quality is to be expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: ... easter photos for my 18 mknth old they fit great as expected and are light on his feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for easter photos for my 18 mknth old they fit great as expected and are light on his feet. They also fit great considering he has a chubby foot lol
customer_reviews.author: Monique M.

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome for kids with wide or chubby feet
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son struggles with shoes because he has wide, flat, and chunky little baby feet. These fit well and are easy to get on which is exactly what I was looking for for my son. Can't beat the price either!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi R

customer_reviews.title: True to color and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes. They run a little wide. If your toddler has a chubby or wide foot these are great!
customer_reviews.author: April M Seay

customer_reviews.title: Suze up
customer_reviews.text: Wide enough, but definitely go up if you're between sizes. My girl is a 9.5 US and I ordered a 10.5 to be safe. They fit, but not much wiggle room. The pink is "dusty rose" more so than true pink.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for TK/Kindergarten shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for TK/Kindergarten shoes. My son loves them. Schools(pre-school/kindergarten) usually ask to dress your kids in shoes with no laces so the teachers do not have to tie 30 students shoes... these are perfect for just that. Very happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great and cheap shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and our toddler loves them. We got all the colors. True to size
customer_reviews.author: BrieLisa

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased a second pair.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, they do breaking quick for an even better fit, my only regret was to not buy a second pair at the time, the other color sold out from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: De Los Santos

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I bought them in multiple colors. They fit great, are easy to get on and dont seem to bother my daughter at all in terms of comfort with or without socks.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Your kid will look like a stud!
customer_reviews.text: Class converse look. Perfect for our 1 year old. Fit is a little tight at first but they get broken in after a few wears.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Very big but good quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seemed huge for the size I ordered but the quality overall seems nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes I loved it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, i loved... but is too big for the size but it's ok he's going to grow into it 😍 besides that is perfect I'll buy again...
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Cute little shoes for my baby boy. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Great, for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, they are so cute and you can't beat the price. Just know that they wear out FAST. My 2 year old has worn them less than 10 times and the front edge is starting to wear away like an eraser would from him dragging his feet. I'll be replacing them sooner than later but they are a good secondary pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: Came right after ordering with no wait. Fit exactly as expected. Great first walker shoe graduating from leather moccasins. My daughter is 13 months I got her 5 size.
customer_reviews.author: vroywarren

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put on and width is perfect too.
customer_reviews.author: edwin

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too small
customer_reviews.text: These were cute shoes. Canvas. But too small. I ordered 1/2 size up. Pretty flexible and the toe area was stiff to protect his toes.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fits great! And they are super cute in person. They look exactly the way they are pictured
customer_reviews.author: Casie Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter Loves these shoes! They look so cute with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Stephm

customer_reviews.title: Simply perfect little shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and easy for little ones to slip on themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Dogmama

customer_reviews.title: Great play shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great little shoe for my daughter. Perfect for play. Cleans up easily. Washes well in washer and let it air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen DiStefano

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: I received these for my daughter’s easter basket and they are huge. UPDATE: The senders have contacted me and have been amazing. Great costumer service.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Walden

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE these shoes but looks like we'll wait ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these shoes but looks like we'll wait until she's a little older and her feet are a little less chunky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I have such a hard time finding shoes for my daughter because her foot is wide, these shoes fit her so comfortably and they are perfect! I got the grey to go with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for the price. They are soft and flexible. They are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Good

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are adorable but I order a size up and they were ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are adorable but I order a size up and they were still a little snug. The quality of the over all shoe is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits great and I actually ordered 3 pair, different colors. They seem comfortable on my daughter so I’m pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laurali Fidurski Zmolik

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but order 1 size down
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes but my daughter is normally a toddler 8.5 and she needed a 7.5 in these
customer_reviews.author: Klh2013

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you want toddler to put own shoes on
customer_reviews.text: Very hard for 3yo to get on and off. Also I bought a size up and they barely fit.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Myers

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Good material. Easy to put on. My son loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Shay Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Cute sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Perfect slip on white canvas sneaker that goes with every cute casual outfit for your lil ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mableen

customer_reviews.title: Easy summer shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfy for kids. Very easy to put them on!
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat these for the price! I will be getting more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: This color is fun and looks great. The shoes are cute and slip on.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Jolley

customer_reviews.title: cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are cute. They stay on fine, fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Monty Gordon

product_meta.title: Kids Canvas Sneaker Slip-on Baby Boys Girls Casual Fashion Shoes
product_meta.description: Uppers: Canvas Soles: Non-marking, man made Care: Spot clean with damp cloth Colors: Black, Pink, White, Blue, Grey The perfect shoe for little feet. A combination of softness, comfort and durability. Great for every day wear, with a favorite outfit, to church, school or play. Versatile and affordable - just the shoe you need for feet that seem to never stop growing.
feature_bullets: CLASSIC STYLE - These classic canvas tennis shoes feature colorful uppers and white soles, The tongue is made of elastic which stretches to make it easy for kids to get the shoes on and off. They go great with any outfit for school, casual or play time
COMFORT - Soft canvas uppers and man-made rubber soles mean comfort for kids little feet while running, jumping and playing
EASY CLEAN - Spot clean with a damp cloth and you're ready for your child's next adventure and non-marking outsole won't leave scuff marks on your floors
BUDGET FRIENDLY - New shoes that won't break the bank, keeping your kids in style can be affordable
FOOT SAFETY - Anti-collision toe cap, Anti-skid and light weight durable sole, provides more protection for kids’ little feet.
